shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes publishing the local audio stream.

p.codeblock: public abstract int muteLocalAudioStreamEx(boolean muted, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int muteLocalAudioStreamEx(bool mute, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
public abstract int MuteLocalAudioStreamEx(bool mute, RtcConnection connection);
Future<void> muteLocalAudioStreamEx( {required bool mute, required RtcConnection connection});

section.title: Details
section.note: This method does not affect any ongoing audio recording, because it does not disable the audio capture device.

pt.props: ios mac cpp unity flutter rn electron

pd.p:
Whether to stop publishing the local audio stream:
: Stops publishing the local audio stream.
: (Default) Resumes publishing the local audio stream.

section.p: 方法成功调用时，无返回值；方法调用失败时，会抛出 异常，你需要捕获异常并进行处理。
